system.requirements:
Tier 3; Rank 4 in chosen Skill
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Knowledge, Unaligned
system.effect:
Character can spend an Infamy/Fate Point to automatically Pass a Skill Test with chosen skill by a number of Degrees of Success equal to Characteristic Bonus of the skill's associated characteristic, provided the final modifier of the skill Test is +0 or better.
This Talent can be taken multiple times, each time for a different skill that meets the talent's requirements. Takes the format of, for example: Mastery(Intimidate), Mastery(Tech-Use)
